events.name: Cold Cryptography: Scientists Can Now Encode Secret Messages in Ice
events.description: Scientists have made a groundbreaking discovery in the field of cryptography, claiming that they can store secret messages by embedding them in the bubbles trapped inside ice using quantum physics.
